classes.name: AppPage

components.name: AdditionalCoversComponent
components.templateData:
Additional covers


Motor Third party Liability Policy
324,00BGN
Four payments
Description of additional cover here
Description of additional cover here
See what's more
+25,00BGN
for 12 months
Description of additional cover here


+80,00BGN
for 12 months

Services provded under the "PREMIUM" clause, but with higher limits when transporting vehicles

In case of an insurance event(no limit in the number of transports and up to 900 km mileage)
Technical failure(no mileage limit and up to 2 transports)
Wrong fuet(disposable)

And more:

Stay in the parking lot of the damaged car
Overview in a hotel of the driver of the vehicle
Transportation of persons traveling in vehicles, in case the vehicle has suffered damage
Medical transportation in case of an accident
Costs of examinations, medical examinations and manipulations in case of bodily injuries to the driver and / or persons traveling in the vehicle as a result of the accident
In case of damages covered by Casco + insurance - up to 2 vehicle inspections at the address indicated by the client

Hide what's included

styleUrlsData.name: MTPLCalculatorComponent
styleUrlsData.templateData:
<mat-horizontal-stepper  (selectionChange)="change($event)" labelPosition="bottom" #stepper1 linear  >
  
      <mat-step completed={{toggle1}}>
        <ng-template matStepLabel>Vehicle </ng-template>
        <app-v-info (OnRegister)="vehicleData($event)" (OnToggle)="toggle1=$event"></app-v-info>
      </mat-step>

      <mat-step completed={{toggle2}}>
        <ng-template matStepLabel>Insuring Party</ng-template>
        <app-insuring-party (OnRegister)="insuringPartyData($event)" (OnToggle)="toggle2=$event"></app-insuring-party>
      </mat-step>

      <mat-step completed={{toggle3}}>
        <ng-template matStepLabel>Policy Details</ng-template>
        <app-policy-details (OnRegister)="policyDetailsData($event)" (OnToggle)="toggle3=$event"></app-policy-details>
      </mat-step>

      <mat-step completed={{toggle4}}>
        <ng-template matStepLabel>Installments</ng-template>
        <app-installment (OnRegister)="installmentsData($event)" (OnToggle)="toggle4=$event"></app-installment>
      </mat-step>

      <mat-step completed={{toggle5}}>
        <ng-template matStepLabel>Covers</ng-template>
        <app-additional-covers (OnRegister)="coversData($event)" (OnToggle)="toggle5=$event" (NextTab)="nextTab($event)"></app-additional-covers>
      </mat-step>

      <!-- <mat-step completed={{toggle6}}>
        <ng-template matStepLabel>Summary</ng-template>
        Summary
      </mat-step> -->

</mat-horizontal-stepper>

styleUrlsData.name: MTPLPolicyComponent
styleUrlsData.templateData:
<mat-horizontal-stepper labelPosition="bottom" #stepper linear>
  <mat-step completed={{toggle1}}>
    <ng-template matStepLabel>Personal details</ng-template>
    <app-personal (OnRegister)="personalData($event)" (OnToggle)="toggle1=$event"></app-personal>
  </mat-step>  
  
  <mat-step completed={{toggle2}}>
    <ng-template matStepLabel>Contact details</ng-template>
    <app-contact (OnRegister)="contactDetailsData($event)" (OnToggle)="toggle2=$event"></app-contact>
  </mat-step> 
  
  <mat-step completed={{toggle3}}>
    <ng-template matStepLabel>Vehicle Owner</ng-template>
    <app-vehicle-owner (OnRegister)="vehicleOwnerData($event)" (OnToggle)="toggle3=$event"></app-vehicle-owner>
  </mat-step>  

  <mat-step completed={{toggle4}}>
    <ng-template matStepLabel>Delivery</ng-template>
    <app-delivery (OnRegister)="deliveryData($event)" (OnToggle)="toggle4=$event"></app-delivery>
  </mat-step>  

  <mat-step completed={{toggle5}}>
    <ng-template matStepLabel >Summary</ng-template>
    <app-proposal (changeStep)="move($event)" (moveTab)="switch($event)"></app-proposal>
  </mat-step>  

  <mat-step completed={{toggle6}}>
    <ng-template matStepLabel>Payment</ng-template>
    <app-payment></app-payment>
  </mat-step> 

  <!-- <mat-step >
        <ng-template matStepLabel>Policy Details</ng-template>
        <app-policy-details  ></app-policy-details>
      </mat-step>
        
      <mat-step >
        <ng-template matStepLabel>Vehicle </ng-template>
        <app-v-info ></app-v-info>
       
      </mat-step> -->
   
</mat-horizontal-stepper>

styleUrlsData.name: TabComponent
styleUrlsData.templateData:
hello {{activeTab}} <button (click)="policyTabToggle=!policyTabToggle">toggle</button>
<mat-tab-group mat-align-tabs="center" [(selectedIndex)]="activeTab">
    <mat-tab label="MTPL Calculator">
        <app-mtpl-calculator (NextTabSwitch)="changeTab($event)"></app-mtpl-calculator>
    </mat-tab>
    <mat-tab label="Purchase MTPL Policy" [disabled]="policyTabToggle"> 
        <app-mtpl-policy (switchTab)="switch($event)"></app-mtpl-policy>
    </mat-tab>
    
</mat-tab-group>
